snippet.title: "The Good,  The Bad, and The Undead" - Deadpool DLC Trailer | Marvel's Midnight Suns
snippet.description:
The Merc with a Mouth is now the Merc with a Date. Join Deadpool as he teams up with the Midnight Suns to tear evil a new one on January 26th! 

Expand your adventure with Deadpool in The Good, The Bad, and The Undead, the first DLC for Marvel’s Midnight Suns. Deadpool joins the team as an in-your face damage dealer wielding 10 unique Hero abilities. Plus, enjoy new story missions, a tasty new Abbey Upgrade, and some stylish cosmetics for everyone’s favorite Merc!

Launch your epic adventure with the legendary #MidnightSuns TODAY!

► Purchase the Legendary Edition to receive the Season Pass containing Deadpool, Venom, Morbius & Storm: https://2kgam.es/3TGGad6

► Watch the Prequel Shorts Intro Teaser: https://youtu.be/k9IPmCKu7qI
► Join the Official Marvel’s Midnight Suns Newsletter and get the exclusive Blade Nightstalker Skin: https://2kgam.es/Nightstalker
► Learn more about the Midnight Suns: https://2kgam.es/3Qdk2V1
-------------------------------------------------
Follow Marvel’s Midnight Suns
-------------------------------------------------
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/midnightsuns
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/midnightsuns
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/midnightsuns
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/midnightsuns

#DarknessFalls #MidnightSuns #DeadpoolSuns
